alert.note: Alert for Lewis (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 16 at 3:48AM EST until February 17 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 1 PM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of an inch or less and ice accumulations up to two tenths of an inch. Greatest ice amounts will be north of Lowville. * WHERE...Lewis county. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 1 PM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Power outages and tree damage are possible due to the ice. Travel could be nearly impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the Friday morning commute.
info.instruction: Periods of snow, sleet or freezing rain will result in slippery roads and limited visibilities. Slow down and use caution while driving. Submit snow and ice reports through our website or social media.
